EmailTemplate.description: When Employee is Raise the request Employee will get New Request Raised Email
EmailTemplate.name: EMS_EM_Req_Employee
EmailTemplate.subject: New Request Raised
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!EMS_EM_Request__c.Contact__c},
You have successfully raised a new request to change your {!EMS_EM_Request__c.EMS_EM_Request_Type__c}.
